headline: TheViewPoint rebrands to Upstream, Launches Direct Sales Automation Platform for CTV Publishers
summary: New product automates direct-sales process for maximum publisher efficiency, launches integrations with Disney, NBCU, Paramount, Tubi, and Warner Bros DiscoverySAN FRANCISCO, Feb. 19, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Infra.tv, a TV advertising technology company, today announced the rebranding of its subsidiary TheViewPoint as Upstream, marking a strategic shift from legacy SSP technology to innovative direct sales automation solutions for CTV publishers. Upstream joins its sister companies, Tatari and
